description: This file defines an API client class for interacting with a web service, including methods for creating authenticated and unauthenticated HTTP clients, and a utility function to check response validity.

classes.name: Api
classes.description: A class encapsulating methods to create HTTP clients with appropriate headers, including authentication handling.

methods.name: __init__
methods.description: Initializes the Api class, setting default headers and internal token state.

methods.name: auth_token
methods.description: Property that retrieves the stored authentication token, reading it if necessary.

methods.name: authenticated_headers
methods.description: Property that constructs headers including authentication tokens and API key.

methods.name: Client
methods.description: Creates a standard HTTP client with base URL and headers.

methods.name: AuthenticatedClient
methods.description: Creates an HTTP client with authentication headers.

methods.name: AsyncClient
methods.description: Creates an asynchronous HTTP client with standard headers.

methods.name: AuthenticatedAsyncClient
methods.description: Creates an asynchronous HTTP client with authentication headers.
